page.title: 03Home Life
page.content: I get up at 7am,dress and have breakfast.Mum does my hair.At 7,30am I go to the allotment and water in the green_house. 7.50 am and I'm at home doing my chores.I drink coffee in the morning.8.40 off to school.Arrive 8.50for a 9.00am start. 10.30 is break_time for 15 minutes.Lunch at 12.00 is sandwiches in the dining hall. At 3.30 I walk home with dad or mum.It's tea at 5.15 and dad goes to work at 6.00pm,until 6.00am. Guitar practice for an hour and then I help mum.I don't watch television in the week at all.I'm in bed for 9.00pm,and read for about half an hour.Weekends mean alater start,mum at work,sis and I make the dinner.The allotment takes up the rest of the time.Every 3rd Sunday is Church for us
